room_title: Escape room "Ocean's Ten - the Garden heist" by AdventurEscape in Hartford
room_address: 1 Corporate Dr, Suite 102 Windsor Locks, CT 06096
room_description:
March 1990. Boston Massachusetts.
The Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum is home to one the world's finest and most extensive art collections. Just after midnight, guards admit 2 men posing as police officers responding to a disturbance. By morning, the museum would be the scene of the largest-value recorded theft of private property in history.
TSee if you have what it takes to pull off the crime of the century in this epic adventure.
